source: separate the wheat from the chaff
lemma: separate the wheat from the chaff
definitions: To distinguish valuable or important things from worthless or irrelevant ones.
To identify the good or useful parts from the bad or useless parts.
examples: It's hard to separate the wheat from the chaff in all this data.
We need to separate the wheat from the chaff when reviewing applications.
Her job is to separate the wheat from the chaff in the research.
